overview: It is about the life of a peasant from the town of Nandaime who is in love with a girl, but the greatest local landowner wants to conquer her too and both must confront mischievously to win the fight they have imposed on each other. The boss — because he is rich and therefore powerful — has everything to gain, but the laborer will not let it be easy.
title: The Man from Nandaime
